Description: Green glazed composition amuletic figure of Nefertum as a recumbent lion wearing a composite crown; suspension loop on the back.
Curator's comments: Published: Andrews, Amulets of Ancient Egypt (1994): p.25
Bibliographic references: Shaw & Nicholson 1995 / British Museum Dictionary of Ancient Egypt (p249)
Acquisition name: Donated by: Mrs Marion Whiteford Acworth JP
